Class ListenerHolder

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.ee10.servlet.BaseHolder<EventListener>
org.eclipse.jetty.ee10.servlet.ListenerHolder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dumpable, LifeCycle
public class ListenerHolder extends BaseHolder<EventListener>
Specialization of BaseHolder for servlet listeners. This allows us to record where the listener originated - web.xml, annotation, api etc.

    • getListener

      public EventListener getListener()

    • setListener

      public void setListener(EventListener listener)
      Set an explicit instance. In this case, just like ServletHolder and FilterHolder, the listener will not be introspected for annotations like Resource etc.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener instance
